name: GroundhogDate
description:
Week 88 Gamejam (Crazy Date)

The Game is about a person that went to a date,  a day before Groundhog-day.
The date end crazy bad and when you wake up the day after, you are in a basement somewhere. 

It's your goal to get out of the basement full of deadly traps. Don't worry it's a crazy date too, so when you die the day starts over!

How to play: Arrows and revive on space

Still missing: 
Smaller map. The map is huge, did not do enough playtest. Will be a smaller map soon. Sorry for that.
